note.p: Birth: Glenellie, near Strabane, in the parish of Upper Badoney, County Tyrone, Ulster (1809)
Death: Committed suicide, Dublin, Ireland (24 October 1847)

Career: Fellow of Trinity College, Dublin (1832); Erasmus Smith's Professor of Mathematics, University of Dublin (1835-1843); awarded Cunningham Medal of the Royal Irish Academy (1838); Erasmus Smith's Professor of Natural and Experimental Philosophy, Trinity College Dublin (1843-1847)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; DSB; Irish Innovators
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1847 No 69 pp 712-718
